data.title: Kalka Dental College
data.text:
or Admission Helpline No.: +91- 9319180111, 9368880111, 9368880777

My Campus

The Campus is built over 25 acres of prime land set in the idyllic environs of Meerut U.P. Ideally located and is a safe haven of lush greenery, pollution free, with plenty of fresh air, conducive to a student life. The campus has the uniqueness of many majestic buildings, large lawns, well maintained playgrounds along with supporting facilities. It has been planned, designed and constructed to address broader issues that relate to resource and energy conservation.

ATM Facility College has 24 hours axis bank ATM facility

At KDC, we lay emphasis on a holistic approach to every individual student’s development. Students are encouraged to follow healthy lifestyles with recreational facilities in the campus after college hours. Gymnasium facilities, outdoor sports activities like football, cricket, volleyball and a well laid basketball court, indoor sports complex and recreation facilities provide distinct advantage in creation and dissemination of knowledge. Hostels are well-equipped with wi-fi internet accessibility besides regular facilities like T.V. room and Study Rooms. Besides the main Mess, canteen facilities (for students and faculty) are available. The campus also has a Temple which gives the students aconnect to The Almighty. Students and faculty also regularly participate in the religious festival like Holi, Diwali, Janmastami, Ganesh Chaturthi, BasantPachami and also celebrating general events like New Year’s Eve. Organization of in-campus activities related to hostel day and fresher’s day and various other programmes which keep the students cheerful and active throughout their stay in the campus.

Sports facilities

Kalka Dental College places enormous stress on all round development of the students. College has a huge ground with facilities for Football, Basketball, Volleyball, Athletics and also has a flood lit cricket ground. Both Boys and Girls Hostels have well equipped gymnasiums and indoor games rooms. The college also has a well maintained, covered swimming pool.
